translation.en: I know it's Christmas, but you don't get into the holiday spirit when it's sunny.
translation.es: Sé que es época de Navidad, pero el sol y el espíritu navideño no combinan.

translation.en: - I need to get home to Norway. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Tengo que volver a Noruega. - Sí.

translation.en: - I'm so excited. - There's so much to do.
translation.es: - No veo la hora. - Hay mucho que hacer.

translation.en: - It's okay, Mom. You've got time. - Yes, but still…
translation.es: - Hay tiempo, mamá. No te preocupes. - Sí, pero igual…

translation.en: Has it been snowing a lot?  Sure, but tell me about your boyfriend!
translation.es: - ¿Estuvo nevando mucho? - Sí. Pero cuéntame de tu novio.

translation.en: Well, you can meet him if you come to visit us.
translation.es: Lo conocerás si vienes a visitarnos.

translation.en: We're settling in nicely. We're doing very well.
translation.es: Nos adaptamos bárbaro. Nos va muy bien.

translation.en: Herregud?  Is that a good thing?
I know you love Christmas, so I wanted to do something Christmas- themed for the…
translation.es: Sé que te encanta la Navidad, así que quise hacer algo temático para…

translation.en: And I know this might be early for Norwegian standards,
translation.es: Sé que es pronto para los tiempos de Noruega,

translation.en: but, in India, we would have had two kids already and they would be in college.
translation.es: pero, en la India, ya tendríamos dos hijos en la universidad.

translation.en: So, if you're not, like, doing anything for the next couple of decades…
translation.es: Así que si no harás nada las próximas décadas…

translation.en: You don't even know my middle name.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sabes mi segundo nombre.

translation.en: And did you actually also know
that I have diabetes running in my family and that's…
translation.es: que en mi familia hay antecedentes de diabetes?

translation.en: You haven't even met my family yet.
translation.es: Ni siquiera conoces a mi familia.

translation.en: But when you know, you know.
translation.es: Pero, cuando lo sabes, lo sabes.

translation.en: Look, the rules say you have to say yes or no.
translation.es: Tienes que decir sí o no.

translation.en: joining me and my family for Christmas in Norway this year?
translation.es: a Noruega este año a pasar Navidad con mi familia y conmigo?

translation.en: I would love to, but it's like you don't know my middle name.
translation.es: Me encantaría, pero no sabes mi segundo nombre…

translation.en: - Yes. Of course. I would love to. - Yeah?
Oh, you have so much to look forward to.
- Christmas in Norway is… is the best. - Mm- hmm.
translation.es: La Navidad noruega es la mejor.

translation.en: You know, I'm so excited to meet your mom, Anne- Lise, and the rest of the family.
translation.es: Qué emoción conocer a tu mamá, Anne-Lise, y al resto de tu familia.

translation.en: I'm gonna tell them to have a god jul.
translation.es: Les desearé god jul, feliz Navidad.

translation.en: - So my family doesn't really know that-- - Is it jool or jul?
translation.es: - Mi familia no sabe… - ¿Se dice jool o jul?

translation.en: - Uh, jul. Yeah, it's jul. Yeah. - Jul? Okay, jul.
translation.es: - Jul. Sí, es jul. - ¿Jul? Bien, jul.

translation.en: - But what I was saying-- - Yeah.
Uh, my family doesn't really know…
Ladies and gentlemen, we're landing at Oslo Airport.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, pronto aterrizaremos en el aeropuerto de Oslo.

translation.en: Please fasten your seat belt and make sure the trays…
translation.es: Ajústense los cinturones y levanten las bandejas…

translation.en: is super excited to see you.
You think this is fresh air?
Are you gonna be like this the whole time?
It's just a family sweater tradition thing that we've been doing forever.
translation.es: Es el suéter tradicional de la familia que usamos desde siempre.

translation.en: I'm sure my mom has knitted one for you too.
translation.es: Seguro que mamá también te tejió uno.

translation.en: Oh, I should have got them something. Oh, like the Indian equivalent of a family sweater.
translation.es: Debí traerles algo. El equivalente indio del suéter familiar.

translation.en: You know what I was trying to tell you earlier.
- Um, I haven't-- - So, you're from India?
Uh, yeah, dude. Have you ever been?
No, I've never been to India. But I've been to Turkey.
translation.es: No, nunca fui a la India. Pero fui a Turquía

translation.en: I think my nostril hair froze to each other.
translation.es: Se me congelaron las fosas nasales.

translation.en: So good to see you, Thea.
- You've decorated so nicely. - Thank you.
- But you have to meet-- - Yes!
Hello, Josh, and welcome to Norway.
- Yes, I can see that. Yes. -
Oh, this is so nice to finally meet you, Shazam.
translation.es: Qué bueno conocerte al fin, Shazam.

translation.en: Oh, wow. Your home is beautiful.
- Oh, look at this. - Yes, yes.
Okay, now, this, this is Christmas.
translation.es: Esta sí es una Navidad de verdad.

translation.en: Same procedure as every year, James.
translation.es: El mismo procedimiento cada año, James.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. It's, uh… It's, uh, Jashan.
- It's fine. You'll get it. - Yeah, but it was--
translation.es: - Ya lo aprenderá. - Sí, pero fue…

translation.en: Yeah. So that's like this tradition that we had,
making all these Christmas decorations every year.
translation.es: cada año, hacemos las decoraciones de Navidad.

translation.en: And when did you make this?
It's all wonky and messed up. It's so sweet.
translation.es: Está torcido, es un desastre, qué tierno.

translation.en: My husband made this the last year before he died.
translation.es: Mi esposo lo hizo el año pasado antes de morir.

translation.en: Yeah, he… he really loved Christmas.
- Mm. Yeah. - Yeah. It's very good.
Who's a good boy? Who's a-- -
- What's up with Balder? - Well, sometimes he reacts to…
translation.es: - ¿Qué le pasa a Balder? - Bueno, a veces reacciona a…

translation.en: To… people who are so unfamiliar.
translation.es: A las personas que son distintas.

translation.en: It's very nice that you made some, but I think…
- We're tired and ate on the plane. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Estamos cansados, comimos en el avión. - Sí.

translation.en: I think we're gonna go to bed.
- Yeah. I know. - Look at your earrings.
And this is just a year after.
translation.es: Y esto fue un año después.

translation.en: - But this is like a different person. - Yeah, but it's a posh period.
translation.es: - Pareces otra persona. - Sí, fue una etapa elegante.

translation.en: Oh, and, uh, who's this dude?
Well, uh…  Uh, good night, mamma.
Sorry. Isn't that what you say in, uh, Norwegian? Mamma?
translation.es: Perdón, ¿no se dice así también en noruego?

translation.en: You… You don't have to call me that.
Oh, no. In India, your in- laws are like your parents.
translation.es: En la India, tus suegros son como tus padres.

translation.en: So that's why I'm actually very happy to call you mamma.
translation.es: Por eso me complace decirle mamá.

translation.en: Yes, but… but we are in… in Telemark.
Okay. Uh, what… what would you prefer that I called you?
But that's so, uh… It's so impersonal.
No? Well, then, mamma it is.
Do you think, uh, she likes me?
do you think your mom likes me?
translation.es: si crees que le agrado a tu mamá.

translation.en: You didn't tell her I was Indian.
translation.es: No le dijiste que era indio.

translation.en: Yeah. So then, why not tell her?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿por qué no se lo contaste?

translation.en: You know, my dad, he was like…
the one who would reason with her.
translation.es: el que la hacía entrar en razón.

translation.en: So if I told her, like, three weeks ago that we were engaged, she would…
translation.es: Si le contaba de nuestro compromiso hace tres semanas, ella…

translation.en: - Photoshop me in a family card? -
She would sit alone in her room…
translation.es: Se habría sentado sola en su cuarto
Antiguas tradiciones de la India y esas cosas.

translation.en: She would blow it totally out of proportion.
translation.es: Exageraría todo a más no poder.

translation.en: In India, we are often told that a daughter's place is with her in- laws.
translation.es: En la India, decimos que el lugar de la hija es con sus suegros.
Al contrario de lo que se cree,

translation.en: this practice is just as common in Indian cities as in the villages.
translation.es: esta práctica es común en ciudades y aldeas indias.

translation.en: - I've put on some coffee if you want. -
Have you talked to Jørgen since…
I know that it hasn't been easy for him either.
translation.es: Sé que tampoco ha sido fácil para él.

translation.en: No, I'm sure it hasn't, but it was a long time ago, Mom.
translation.es: Seguro que no, pero fue hace mucho, mamá.

translation.en: No, it's just a shame that it had to end like that.
translation.es: Es una pena que terminaran así.

translation.en: - You and the boy next door. -
translation.es: Tú y el hijo del vecino.

translation.en: All that stuff just got too complicated.
Dad and I always thought it was going to be the two of you.
translation.es: que papá y yo siempre pensamos que se casarían.

translation.en: - You're up early as well. - Mm- hmm.
I'm going to get started on the rice pudding now
translation.es: Empezaré con el arroz con leche

translation.en: Dad always used to make it two days in advance.
translation.es: Papá siempre lo preparaba dos días antes.

translation.en: You could have told me a little earlier
Is that okay to say, though? Indian? Is that allowed?
Yes, Mom. You can say Indian.
Fine. But do I have to make two Christmas dinners now?
translation.es: Bien. Pero ¿ahora tengo que preparar dos cenas de Navidad?

translation.en: I know that Norwegian and Indian cultures are incredibly different.
translation.es: Sé que la cultura noruega y la india son muy distintas.

translation.en: - What have you been googling now? - I haven't been googling.
There's just so much to do before Christmas.
translation.es: Tengo mucho que hacer antes de Navidad.

translation.en: I have to prepare the medister meatballs, and then we have to get firewood.
translation.es: Tengo que preparar las albóndigas, y tenemos que ir a buscar leña.

translation.en: Your brother gets stressed out if we don't have firewood.
translation.es: Tu hermano se estresa si no tenemos leña.

translation.en: And now I might have to make two Christmas dinners.
translation.es: Y ahora tal vez tenga que preparar dos cenas de Navidad.

translation.en: I don't know your boyfriend, and I don't know what they eat in India for Christmas.
translation.es: No conozco a tu novio y no sé qué se come en la India para Navidad.

translation.en: Yeah, the sun doesn't rise until ten.
translation.es: Sí, el sol no sale hasta las 10:00.

translation.en: Maybe we should give my mom a… a bit more time.
translation.es: que deberíamos darle más tiempo a mi mamá.

translation.en: You don't wanna tell her about the engagement?
No. Yeah. Of course I want to tell her. It's just--
translation.es: No, claro que quiero contarle. Es que…

translation.en: Do I need to ask for her permission or something?
No. No, no, no. That's not a thing here.
translation.es: No, aquí no se hace eso.

translation.en: Okay, well, then we should just tell her.
No need to keep it a secret, right?
I just want the timing to be right.
When will the timing be right?
I just want her to get to know you.
translation.es: Quiero que ella te conozca mejor.

translation.en: see the side of you that I fell in love with.
translation.es: entienda por qué me enamoré de ti.

translation.en: - You want me to have sex with your mom? -
translation.es: ¿Quieres que me acueste con tu mamá?

translation.en: Fine. I just wasn't ready for this, but, you know, if that's local tradition…
translation.es: Bien. No estaba listo para esto, pero si es una tradición aquí…

translation.en: And then we can tell her.
It's going to be a perfect Christmas.
Hey, I know you told me to be myself,
translation.es: Sé que me dijiste que actuara con naturalidad,

translation.en: but is there anything more I can do to connect with your brother?
translation.es: pero ¿qué más puedo hacer para vincularme con tu hermano?

translation.en: Like what does he like? Sports? Snow?
You're gonna be fine. He's gonna like you.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Le caerás bien.
No te preocupes. Le caerás bien. Bien.

translation.en: And his wife is the fun one, right?
translation.es: Y su esposa es la divertida, ¿no?

translation.en: More… More like no during Christmas.
No. Because she's on edge with my mom.
translation.es: No. Porque mi mamá la pone nerviosa.

translation.en: - Yeah. It's gonna be fine. - It's gonna be fine.
- Nice to see you. - Hello, you!
Merry Christmas! And look at you!
- Nice to meet you. - Nice to meet you.
This must be Ronja. God jul, Ronja.
translation.es: Ella debe ser Ronja. God jul, Ronja.

translation.en: Having some trouble with the chair?
- Stuck? Okay. Can I try? - Stuck, yeah. Sure.
- I have a black belt in car seats. - Okay.
translation.es: - Tengo una maestría en sillitas. - Ya veo.

translation.en: Am I a horrible human being if I say that I'm a little surprised?
translation.es: ¿Soy muy mala persona si digo que estoy un poco sorprendido?

translation.en: There are a billion Indians, so the odds of meeting one are pretty big.
translation.es: Hay miles de millones de indios, tienes muchas chances de conocer a uno.

translation.en: - Okay, shit chair. - He's very handsome.
- I wasn't supposed to tell you yet. - What?
Are you kidding? You just met.
- I haven't told her yet. - You haven't.
translation.es: - Aún no se lo conté. - Claro que no.

translation.en: I'm waiting for the perfect timing.
This is going to be great!
Brown cheese on Christmas cake is the best.
translation.es: El pastel de Navidad con queso marrón es riquísimo.
Tiene mucho gusto a cabra, mamá.

translation.en: Sorry, mamma. I think I might be allergic to snow.
translation.es: Perdón, mamá, creo que soy alérgico a la nieve.

translation.en: ♪ All is calm, all is bright… ♪
You hang Norwegian flags on Christmas?

translation.es: No te comas las decoraciones, Hildegunn.

translation.en: - Is it decorations? - It is decorations.  I didn't know.
Help me in the kitchen, will you? Yes, of course.
translation.es: - Ayúdame en la cocina. - Sí, claro.

translation.en: Simen, we are not supposed to eat these.
Sorry, Anne- Lise. I didn't know…
You know, even Americans don't do this. They're pretty patriotic.
translation.es: Ni los estadounidenses hacen esto, y eso que son muy patriotas.

translation.en: - That's a thing? - It's a thing in Norway.
What if we make dinner something special tonight? and tell them about the engagement?
translation.es: ¿Y si hacemos algo especial para la cena y anunciamos el compromiso?

translation.en: Does she understand English? I don't… I don't know.
You and your family have been sharing your culture with me,
and I thought I would share the best of Indian culture with you. Food.
translation.es: y pensé en compartir con ustedes lo mejor de la cultura india, la comida.

translation.en: Wow. Where did you get all the spices?
I bring them with me, bro. Duh.
You said let's make dinner something special.
Jashan, I said let's make dinner something special,
translation.es: Hablé de hacer algo especial para la cena

translation.en: like… Not make something special for dinner.
translation.es: no de preparar algo especial para cenar.

translation.en: I thought everyone would be busy with Christmas stuff,
translation.es: Creí que todos estarían ocupados con la Navidad

translation.en: and I would make dinner and surprise everyone.
- I love your cooking. - I know.
It's, um… It's Teeny Tiny Christmas.
It's the day before the day before the big day,
translation.es: Es el día anterior al día antes del gran día,

translation.en: and it's sort of like a big deal in our family.
translation.es: es muy importante para nuestra familia.

translation.en: I thought the big day was December 25th.
translation.es: Creí que el gran día era el 25 de diciembre.

translation.en: I told you. In Norway, it's 24th.
translation.es: Te dije que, en Noruega, es el 24.

translation.en: So there's a teeny day before a tiny day before the big day,
translation.es: Entonces ¿hay un día antes del día anterior al gran día,
que es antes del 25 de diciembre?

translation.en: No. Maybe I exaggerated a little.
translation.es: No, tal vez exageré un poco.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - I don't know what I'm doing.
the dinner we're used to for Teeny Tiny Christmas.
translation.es: la cena que acostumbramos comer en la mini-Navidad.

translation.en: We always have medister cakes on Little Little Christmas.
translation.es: Siempre comemos albóndigas en la mini-Navidad.

translation.en: I actually just found out about Teeny Tiny Christmas.
translation.es: Acabo de enterarme de la mini-Navidad.

translation.en: - Yeah. But now we have curry, so… -
meatballs on Teeny Tiny Christmas, and you all really liked it.
translation.es: albóndigas para la mini-Navidad, y te gustaban mucho.

translation.en: But maybe we can just give this a try?
Did you hear that? Did you hear that?
- Can you hear it? - No, what?
- It was just Dad turning in his grave. - Stop it.
translation.es: - Papá se está revolcando en su tumba. - Basta.

translation.en: Ronja, Dad is joking. Grandpa is dead.
translation.es: Ronja, papá hizo un chiste. El abuelo está muerto.

translation.en: He hasn't risen from the dead. He is not moving at all.
Thank you for keeping an open mind.
We've been eating meatballs every year.
Norwegians are a very accepting people.
translation.es: Los noruegos somos gente muy tolerante.

translation.en: I understand this is different from your normal traditions.
translation.es: Entiendo es que esto difiere mucho de sus tradiciones.

translation.en: You've probably never had Indian food before. So--
translation.es: Tal vez nunca comieron comida india.

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe you can take it in English so that Jashan understands.
translation.es: Podrían hablar en inglés, así Jashan entiende.

translation.en: - We eat Indian food. - Yeah. We love Indian food.
translation.es: - Comemos comida india. - Sí, nos encanta.

translation.en: There's great Indian food at the Chinese restaurant in town.
translation.es: Hay muy buena comida india en el restaurante de comida china.

translation.en: I'm sorry, did you say there was a Chinese restaurant that serves Indian food?
translation.es: ¿Dijiste que un restaurante chino sirve comida india?

translation.en: - Yeah. It's not really Indian food. It's… - Yeah.
translation.es: Sí, no es comida india de verdad…

translation.en: Yes. It's, uh… It's Indian and… and Chinese,
and… and they have a lot of Norwegian dishes. - Yes. - Uh, like pizza and hamburgers.
translation.es: y tienen muchos platos noruegos, como pizza y hamburguesas.

translation.en: - And the chef… Oh! - Oh, the chef is so good.
translation.es: - Y el cocinero… - El cocinero es muy bueno.

translation.en: - He is good. - He is good.
Ronja, don't you agree? They serve good food at the Chinese place.
translation.es: ¿Qué dices, Ronja? Sirven buena comida en el restaurante chino.

translation.en: - Jashan is a good cook too. -
translation.es: Jashan también es muy buen cocinero.

translation.en: - Yeah. - It… It smells really good.
Shazam, since this is your, hmm, first Christmas--
translation.es: Shazam, ya que es tu primera Navidad…

translation.en: Oh, we have Christmas in India.
translation.es: En la India se festeja la Navidad.

translation.en: Oh, but I knew, but…  Sorry. How do you usually celebrate?
Well, uh, my family is not Christian,
so we do this funny thing of, like, we'll do a countdown to midnight,
translation.es: así que hacemos una cuenta regresiva hasta medianoche

translation.en: and then we say Merry Christmas,
translation.es: y luego nos deseamos feliz Navidad.

translation.en: and we get smashed and we have a lot of food, set off fireworks.
translation.es: Nos embriagamos, comemos mucho y tiramos fuegos artificiales.

translation.en: That sounds like New Year's here in Norway.
translation.es: Se parece al Año Nuevo en Noruega.
- Sí. - ¿Se parece? Es el Año Nuevo.

translation.en: And, you know, this year, I'm so happy to be here with all of you
translation.es: Y este año me alegra estar aquí con todos ustedes

translation.en: and to get to share this part of my culture with you.
translation.es: y poder compartirles parte de mi cultura.

translation.en: - Mm. - Do you like it, mamma?
What is it? Are you okay?
- Is it that spicy? - No, it's really…
I'm so sorry. It's very good. I just have to…
translation.es: Lo lamento. Está rico. Tengo que…

translation.en: - I'll go with Mom. - If you have to spit it out, use this.
translation.es: - Iré con mamá. - Si vas a escupir, usa esto.

translation.en: Anne- Lise doesn't want it on her rug.
translation.es: Anne-Lise no quiere que ensuciemos la alfombra.

translation.en: Yeah, just… Yeah, just… I just need to check.
You guys are being very dramatic.
- Mamma, water will not help. - Excuse me?
It's… You need some dairy. Uh, if you have yogurt?
I don't know. I don't know. I really don't know.
translation.es: No sé. La verdad, no sé.

translation.es: - No coman el arroz con leche. - ¡Por favor, mamá! No hay alternativa.

translation.en: But Dad said it needs to stay…
translation.es: Pero papá decía que debe reposar

translation.en: - Longer. Are you sure? - Eat, eat.
I think it needs more time to set.
translation.es: De hecho, tiene que reposar un poco más.

translation.en: How many chilies did you use?
Spice is about more than just chilies. This is super mild.
translation.es: No se condimenta solo con ajíes. Esto está muy suave.

translation.en: There's a difference between Norwegian spicy and Indian spicy.
translation.es: Hay una diferencia entre el picante noruego y el indio.

translation.es: No sé si Simen te lo contó,

translation.en: Okay. Hildegunn, she… she… she… lived in India for several months.

I actually…  I wanted to show you this.
What is it? Don't you like it?
- Yeah?  - Yeah. No. What is it?

translation.es: Tal vez no diga paz interior.

translation.en: It doesn't matter what it means, does it?
Thea, it is important because it's a tattoo.
translation.es: Thea, sí importa, es un tatuaje.

translation.en: It's cut into my body until I die.

Hypothetically speaking, it might say gori.
That doesn't sound so bad.  What… What does that mean?
White girl, that's…  …exactly what I am.

translation.es: Salgo a esquiar, nada me puede desanimar.

translation.en: Out on a hike, what's not to…
translation.es: Salgo a esquiar, nada me puede…

translation.es: Aquí decimos que los noruegos nacemos con esquíes en los pies.

translation.en: Yeah? Sounds like a painful childbirth.
No.  Out on a hike, what's not to like?
translation.es: No. Salgo a esquiar, nada me puede desanimar.

We have this lunch place just on the other side of the hill.

Maybe you should go in advance?
So we can ski at our tempo, so he doesn't feel…

I know, but it's a bit different.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero ahora es distinto.

Can't we make gingerbread cookies some other time?

translation.en: - I need to pack the rucksack. - Take this…
translation.es: - Tengo que armar la mochila. - Toma esto…

translation.en: Uh… We… The two of us can go together.
- Yeah. It's called koselig, right? - We're home soon. I promise.
translation.es: Sí. Se dice koselig, ¿no? Pronto llegaremos.

translation.en: We just need to go down to Oksetjønn and take a left to Skjerdalen.
translation.es: Hay que llegar al Oksetjønn y girar a la izquierda en Skjerdalen.

translation.en: Those names mean nothing. You're making them up.
translation.es: Esos nombres no me dicen nada. Los estás inventando.

translation.en: - - I won't do it. Leave me here.
Have you ever done this before?
My dad used to do it with me.
- This is… It's actually working. - It's working.
Do you want me to ask Simen to look for them?
translation.es: ¿Le pido a Simen que vaya a buscarlos?

translation.en: No, let him relax. He's put on his comfy joggers…
translation.es: No, déjalo descansar. Se puso sus pantalones cómodos,

translation.en: with a glass of Christmas soda in his hand,
translation.es: tiene un vaso de soda de Navidad en la mano

translation.en: getting into the spirit with Die Hard.
translation.es: y entró en clima navideño viendo Duro de matar.

translation.en: It's just difficult without my dad.
And every year is just a reminder of what we lost.
translation.es: Cada año, esto nos recordará que ya no está.

translation.en: And I really want them to like you
translation.es: Y quiero que ellos te acepten

translation.en: You know, in Norway, we call this koselig.
translation.es: En Noruega, a esto le decimos koselig.

translation.en: That's crazy. What a small country.
translation.es: Qué locura. Este país es un pañuelo.

translation.en: Are you going somewhere? What are you doing here?
- Hey. - I'm just telling him that we're not lost.
translation.es: - Hola. - Le decía que no estamos perdidos.

translation.en: We're not lost. We're just going to Oksischen and Shellbraider.
translation.es: No estamos perdidos. Vamos a Oksischen y a Shellbraider.

translation.en: You sure you don't want a ride?
- Dude, we would love a ride. - Yes. We're fine.
I'm not gonna ski back. Yes, we would love a ride.
translation.es: No volveré esquiando. Sí, iremos contigo.

translation.en: - Okay. - Thank you so much. That's amazing.
Oh, dude, can I sit in the carriage?  Let me take the skis.
translation.es: - ¿Puedo ir en el carro? - Denme los esquíes.

translation.en: Dude, we're making something called pepper cakes. You wanna come inside?
What do you mean, dude? You saved my life.
Come on. Come inside. We'll have a drink or something.
It might be a bit weird.
Why would it be weird? What? You guys used to hook up or something?
- Yeah. - Yeah. Together for five years.
Didn't really… get to that part.
No, we just live together. We don't talk about stuff.
translation.es: Solo vivimos juntos, no hablamos de esas cosas.

translation.en: Oh, hey, see you around, dude.
So that's the guy from the picture in the stairway.
translation.es: Así que ese es el tipo de la foto de la escalera.

translation.en: Don't you think you should get a new apron?
I've always had it. Lasse gave it to me when we were…
translation.es: Lo tengo desde siempre. Lasse me lo regaló cuando…

translation.en: So you thought it was a good idea to call my ex?
translation.es: ¿Te pareció una buena idea llamar a mi ex?

translation.en: I was worried about you two. I got scared.
translation.es: Estaba preocupada por los dos. Me asusté.

translation.en: Mom, that is a very weird thing to do.
Remember that before he was your ex, he was the kid next door.
translation.es: Antes de ser tu ex, era el vecino de al lado.

translation.en: So if you think it's weird, it's because you're making it weird.
translation.es: Si te parece incómodo, es porque tú lo vuelves incómodo.

translation.en: Yeah. I just can't figure out this house.
translation.es: Sí. No sé cómo armar esta casa.

translation.en: But I'm happy to be inside.
It would have been nice to get some heads- up that your ex lives next door.
translation.es: Habría sido bueno que me avisaras que tu ex vive al lado.

translation.en: I almost forgot. When are we doing our Christmas dip tomorrow?
translation.es: Casi lo olvido, mañana es el baño de Navidad.

translation.en: Can't we just do it when we wake up?
- Are you going to the… - Ah, you bet, Simen.
translation.es: ¿Irás? Claro que sí, Simen. Vine a vivir la Navidad noruega a pleno.

translation.en: I am here for the full Norwegian Christmas experience.
translation.es: Claro que sí, Simen. Vine a vivir la Navidad noruega a pleno.

translation.en: No, Jashan, you don't really need to do that.
translation.es: No, Jashan, no tienes que hacerlo.

translation.en: - I want to. - Jashan, it's fine.
Oh, that's nice that you're joining us for isbading.
translation.es: Qué lindo que nos acompañes al isbading.

translation.en: I am very happy to join you for… what?

translation.es: Es tal cual lo que piensas.

translation.en: - It's healthy. - How can this be healthy?
You said you wanted the full Norwegian Christmas experience.
translation.es: Querías vivir la Navidad noruega a pleno.

translation.en: Yeah, but that was before I knew you guys were crazy.
translation.es: Eso fue antes de saber que están todos locos.
- Hola. - Por supuesto que él vino.

translation.en: - Yeah. So we all do this? - Hi.
Isn't it a bit too cold for him?
translation.es: ¿No es un poco frío para él?

translation.en: - Uh… - It's a bit too cold for you.
translation.es: Está un poco frío para ti.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I was just actually warming up before I went in.
translation.es: No, de hecho, estaba calentando antes de meterme.

translation.en: - You must be cold.  - Not at all.
It's so nice that you came.
Merry Christmas. This is so nice.
translation.es: Feliz Navidad. Qué lindo es esto.

translation.en: I have to admit, I hated it when these two little birds
translation.es: Debo reconocer que odié cuando estas dos palomitas

translation.en: forced me into ice bathing for the first time.
translation.es: me obligaron a bañarme en agua helada la primera vez.

translation.en: Well, actually, you know, no one's forcing me, so…
translation.es: De hecho, nadie me obliga, así que…

translation.en: - Oh. No, no, no. Of course. - Yeah. Yeah.
for the full Norwegian Christmas experience.
translation.es: a vivir la Navidad noruega a pleno.

translation.en: Jash, you really don't have to do it. It's fine.
I didn't know you were Christian.
Why are we in a church?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué vinimos a la iglesia?

translation.en: And because Ronja is in the choir, and she is looking forward to her solo.
translation.es: Y porque Ronja está en el coro, y espera ansiosa su solo.

translation.en: ♪ In the soul's joyful pilgrim song ♪
translation.es: en la canción peregrina del alma jubilosa.

translation.en: - But you guys are whispering it. - Okay.
♪ A savior for all time is born ♪
Before we go out into this beautiful Christmas Day,
translation.es: Antes de salir a disfrutar de este hermoso día de Navidad,

translation.en: wish you a Merry Christmas with this--
translation.es: les desea feliz Navidad con este…

translation.en: You're the one who said ice bathing was a good idea.
translation.es: Tú me incitaste a bañarme en agua helada.

translation.en: - - ♪ Round yon Virgin Mother and Child ♪
translation.es: Entre los astros que expanden su luz…

translation.en: ♪ Holy infant so tender and mild ♪
Fine. I'll go out in the cold.
I'm sure freezing temperature will help.
translation.es: El frío helado seguro que ayudará.

translation.en: Can you hear me? Hello. Hi.
They just come to church for Christmas.
translation.es: Vienen a la iglesia para Navidad.

translation.en: They do weird things, and when I ask why, it's just tradition.
translation.es: Hacen cosas raras y, cuando pregunto, me dicen que es por tradición.

translation.en: Thea, can you please stop your boyfriend?
translation.es: Thea, ¿puedes ir a parar a tu novio?

translation.en: - This is not okay. - Yes, shush.
translation.es: - Esto no está bien. - Sí, silencio.

translation.en: They do weird things all the time.
translation.es: Hacen cosas raras. Si pregunto por qué, dicen:

translation.en: If you ask why, That's just how it is…
How do you say, I'm sorry, Ronja?
I'm not talking about the church.
I thought it'd be fun to bring my loudest kurta to a Christmas party but…
translation.es: Me pareció divertido traer mi kurta más llamativa para Navidad, pero…

translation.en: - Uh, can you help me with this? - Sure.
- Okay. So you just want it to kind of go… -
Sorry. I just… It's… Yeah, just try again.
translation.es: Perdón, es que… Inténtalo otra vez.

translation.en: Like I needed more proof I didn't fit in here.
translation.es: Como si necesitara más pruebas de que no encajo aquí.

translation.en: It's like, you can't really wear jewelry
Something called bunad police. It's like a traditional thing.
translation.es: Lo dice la policía de la moda tradicional.

translation.en: You know what? I'll just go and ask my mom.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Le pediré a mamá que me ayude.

translation.en: Jashan is sorry for ruining your moment in church.
translation.es: Jashan lamenta haber arruinado tu momento en la iglesia.

translation.en: There's not much left for him to ruin now.
translation.es: Ya no le queda mucho por arruinar.

translation.en: We've been through all the crazy stuff leading up to Christmas.
translation.es: Ya hicimos todas las locuras previas a la Navidad.

translation.en: Hot dog on the grill, um, church, not to mention Christmas bathing.
translation.es: Salchichas asadas, ir a la iglesia, ni hablar del baño navideño.

translation.en: Don't call it Christmas bathing. It makes it sound fun.
translation.es: No le digas baño navideño, parece que fuera divertido.
que solo queda la cena de Navidad.

translation.en: We eat some cookies. We, uh, open presents.
And by the end of the night,
translation.es: Y al final de la noche,

translation.en: I think we should tell them. We should break the news about our engagement.
translation.es: se los diremos. Anunciaremos nuestro compromiso.

translation.en: - All right. Yeah. We're telling them. - Okay.
translation.es: - Muy bien. - Sí, se los diremos.

translation.en: - Do you like it? - Great crispy pork crackling, Mom.
translation.es: ¿Te gusta? Qué crocante está el chicharrón.

translation.en: Oh no. Maybe you… you can't eat pig.
translation.es: Tal vez no puedes comer cerdo.

translation.en: Uh, I'm Hindu. Muslims don't eat pork.
translation.es: Soy hindú. Los musulmanes no comen cerdo.

translation.en: - Yes, of course. - Yes. I remember now.
translation.es: - Sí, claro. - Sí, ahora lo recuerdo.

translation.en: Ronja, you have to eat your food, not just move it around.
translation.es: Ronja, no juegues con la comida, come.

translation.en: Grandma has spent so much time making it. You have to taste it.
translation.es: La abuela pasó horas preparándola, tienes que saborearla.

translation.en: Sauce. Yes. What sauce is this?
translation.es: Salsa. Sí. ¿De qué es la salsa?

translation.en: - You have to have it. - It's very good.
translation.es: - Tienes que probarla. - Es muy rica.

translation.en: And what kind of fat is this?
translation.es: ¿Y qué tipo de grasa es esa?

translation.en: Oh, no, no. It's not fat.

translation.es: Es aquavit, el agua de la vida.

translation.en: You know, it's the potato booze I was telling you about?
translation.es: Es la bebida destilada de papa de la que te hablé.

translation.en: - This does help. - Mm- hmm. - Can I have some more? - Yeah.
translation.es: - Sí que ayuda. ¿Me sirves más? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah. But you don't need to do the whole shot.
translation.es: No tienes que hacer fondo blanco.

translation.en: I don't think that's so smart, but…
translation.es: No creo que sea buena idea, pero…

translation.en: - Uh, do you want… - No. No. I'm not drinking.
How am I supposed to finish this?
Now this is more like it!
I'm so glad you liked it.
- Liked it? I love it. - Oh.
Hindu is a Norwegian spice brand?
translation.es: ¿Hindú es una marca noruega de especias?

translation.en: - Black Boy? - Yeah. It's fine. Stop.
…as an Indian person, I never thought I would be offended by spices.
translation.es: Como indio, nunca creí que las especias me ofenderían.

translation.en: - Yeah. - But these are pretty racist condiments--
translation.es: - Sí. - Pero son condimentos muy racistas…

translation.en: Has he been seasoning my pork with garlic powder and piri- piri?
translation.es: ¿Condimentó mi cerdo con ajo en polvo y piri-piri?

translation.en: I mean, come on. No disrespect, but I use an entire garlic to fry an egg.
translation.es: Sin ánimo de ofender, uso un ajo entero para freír un huevo.

translation.en: - You understand it's challenging to eat… - Jashan.
translation.es: - Entenderá lo que es comer… - Jashan.

translation.en: …unseasoned pork with crunchy fat and chewy fat and fat sauce.
translation.es: …cerdo sin condimentar con grasa crocante, grasa chiclosa y salsa de grasa.

translation.en: Why do you have Black Boy and Hindu spices in your house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tiene especias Negrito e Hindú en su casa?

translation.en: Well, if he doesn't like it, then I'm sure we have a lot of curries that Shazam--
translation.es: Si no le gusta, tenemos muchos curris que Shazam…

translation.en: Okay? Not Shazam. Not Sasham. It's Jashan.
translation.es: No Shazam ni Sasham. Me llamo Jashan.

translation.en: I'll go and get some more sausages.
Can you please just try to fit in?
Like Hildegunn who pretends like she has no personality so she can fit into your Norwegian Christmas cult.
translation.es: Finge no tener personalidad para encajar en tu secta navideña.

translation.en: Yeah. Christmas cult, with your crazy uniforms and your weird rituals.
translation.es: Sí, secta navideña, con uniformes locos y rituales raros.

translation.en: I'm not asking you to dye your hair blond or to speak Norwegian.
translation.es: No te pido que te tiñas de rubio o hables noruego.

translation.en: - - I just want my family to be happy for us.
translation.es: Solo quiero que mi familia se alegre.

translation.en: Why would they be happy for us if you force me to eat pork fat?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se alegrarían si me obligas a comer grasa de cerdo?

translation.en: So is baby tossing and human sacrifice and stoning.
translation.es: También arrojar bebés, los sacrificios humanos y la lapidación.

translation.en: Just because it's tradition doesn't mean it's good.
translation.es: No todas las tradiciones son buenas.

translation.en: Can we please talk about this later? No, I am upset now.
translation.es: - Después lo hablamos. - No, estoy enojado ahora.

translation.en: And is that the answer for everything?
translation.es: ¿Y esa es la respuesta para todo?

translation.en: Why do atheists go to church? It's Christmas.
translation.es: Los ateos van a la iglesia porque es Navidad.

translation.en: Why do we swim in ice water? It's Christmas.
translation.es: Nadamos en agua helada porque es Navidad.

translation.en: Why do we hide our feelings? It's Christmas.
translation.es: No decimos lo que sentimos porque es Navidad.

translation.en: What does it say on this one?

translation.es: - Para la tía Thea. - Por supuesto.

translation.en: - Come on, Aunt Thea. - You must come and get your present.
translation.es: - Vamos, tía Thea. - Ven a buscar tu regalo.

translation.en: Maybe you want to sit on Santa's lap?
translation.es: ¿Quieres sentarte en la falda de Papá Noel?

translation.en: - You have to sit. - Yes, you have to sit.
translation.es: - Tienes que sentarte. - Sí, tienes que hacerlo.

translation.en: There we go. This is cozy.
Have you been a good girl this year, Aunt Thea?
translation.es: ¿Te has portado bien este año, tía Thea?

translation.en: I'm sorry. Am I the only one who finds this weird?
translation.es: Perdón, ¿soy el único al que esto le parece raro?

translation.en: Maybe someone is upset he's not getting a present from Santa this year?
translation.es: Tal vez alguien está enojado porque este año no recibirá un regalo.

translation.en: Well, it's getting late, little Ronja.
and the night is still young.
- Yeah. - What the fuck, man? Don't push me.
- Oh yeah? One more time? - Jashan!
I think Santa should get going.
translation.es: Creo que Papá Noel debería irse.

translation.en: Because you don't fit in to this Christmas cult?
translation.es: ¿Porque no encajas en esta secta navideña?

translation.en: - I'm gonna chop some wood. - I'll start the dishes.
translation.es: - Iré a cortar leña. - Lavaré los platos.

translation.en: Do you think that's what it's about?
I knew it would be difficult to fit in with your family,
translation.es: Sabía que sería difícil encajar con tu familia

translation.en: and I knew it would be difficult to fit in with your traditions.
And if you came to India, you would have a hard time fitting in too.
translation.es: Y si vinieras a la India, también te costaría encajar.

translation.en: The difference is, I would have had your back.
translation.es: La diferencia es que yo te habría apoyado.

translation.en: Or are you someone so obsessed with making Christmas perfect that you lost sight of me?
translation.es: ¿O estás tan obsesionada con la Navidad que te olvidaste de mí?

translation.en: Then why won't you tell your family we're engaged?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no les contaste del compromiso?

translation.en: I was just waiting for the right moment.
- So, listen to some music, or do you… - I'm okay.
Yes. But we can be silent. That's all. No problem.
No. You can't be sad on Christmas Eve.
translation.es: No se puede estar triste en Nochebuena.

translation.en: There are many presents left, Ronja. Why don't you go get one more?
translation.es: Quedaron muchos regalos, Ronja. ¿Por qué no abres uno más?
Pero le pegó a Papá Noel.

translation.en: It was just Jørgen who was pretending because he is in love with you.
translation.es: Era Jørgen disfrazado, porque está enamorado de ti.

translation.en: I don't think he's actually in love.
But Jashan ruined your song in church, and you were so excited about it.
translation.es: Pero Jashan arruinó tu canción en la iglesia, y estabas emocionada.

translation.en: Not really. I just sang because Mom says that Grandma wants me to.
translation.es: La verdad, no. Solo canté porque mamá dice que la abuela quiere.

translation.en: I like it when the children sing.
translation.es: Me gusta que los niños canten.

translation.en: I was thinking. Your bunad is so beautiful.
- I don't give a shit. - You can't say shit.
translation.es: - Me importa un carajo. - No se dice carajo.

translation.en: - Where are you going? - The airport.
No, I'm not sure, Mom. I'm not.
I just can't listen to you right now.
And I know you think that my relationship with Jashan is just a phase
translation.es: Sé que crees que mi relación con Jashan es un capricho pasajero

translation.en: because I've messed around so much.
Maybe you should go and play with your Christmas gifts.
translation.es: Ve a jugar con tus regalos de Navidad.

translation.en: I've just tried to make everything right this Christmas
translation.es: Traté de hacer todo bien esta Navidad,

translation.en: because I know it's important to you and because
translation.es: porque sé que es importante para ti

translation.en: I wanted to do it like we always did it with Dad
translation.es: y porque quería hacer lo que hacíamos con papá

translation.en: to help Jashan fit in and…
And to make you like him.
But it's not mine or Jashan's job to make you like him.
translation.es: Pero no nos corresponde a Jashan o a mí hacer que él te caiga bien.

translation.en: This was supposed to be happy news,
translation.es: Tenía que ser una noticia feliz,

translation.en: but I might as well say it now since everyone is in such great spirits.
translation.es: pero mejor se los cuento ahora, ya que están todos de tan buen ánimo.

translation.en: Pretty stupid to throw him out on Christmas Eve, then.
I thought my life was perfect.
translation.es: creía que mi vida era perfecta.

translation.en: You were supposed to live in the house next door,
translation.es: Ibas a vivir en la casa de al lado,

translation.en: and your kids were supposed to come to our house to do homework
translation.es: y tus hijos vendrían a nuestra casa a hacer la tarea
y a comer bollos de canela.

translation.en: I'm the one who should say sorry.
I'm just afraid to lose you.

translation.es: No me iré a ninguna parte.

translation.en: There is a reason you don't drink alcohol on Christmas Eve.
translation.es: Por algo no se bebe alcohol en Nochebuena.

translation.en: You didn't all have to come with me.
Of course we had to come. We all have to apologize.
translation.es: Claro que sí, tenemos que disculparnos.

translation.en: Can we please slow down a bit?
We are on our way to the airport on Christmas Eve.
We're getting her fiancé. This is the most romantic thing I've ever experienced.
translation.es: a buscar a su prometido. Es lo más romántico que viví en mi vida.

translation.en: - Shut up, please. - Saying shut up is not allowed.
translation.es: - Cállate, por favor. - No se dice cállate.

translation.en: Your mom is allowed to say shut up.
We're not going to make it.
Of course we're going to make it.
And you were totally right about everything you said
translation.es: Y tenías razón en todo lo que dijiste.

translation.en: about me not having your back.
I'm sorry I didn't tell them about the engagement.
translation.es: Lamento no haberles contado de nuestro compromiso.

translation.en: I just… I don't know. I thought it would be easier that way.
translation.es: No sé. Creí que sería más fácil así.
Pero no me gusta lo fácil.

translation.en: How… How did you get inside the airport?
Do you think Santa will come tonight?
I don't think Santa's gonna come after last year.
translation.es: No creo que venga después de lo del año pasado.

translation.en: Oh, I wonder what it is.
You know what, Jashan, I, uh… I just have to say I loved the tikka ma- pinnekjøtt.
translation.es: Jashan, me encantó el tikka ma-pinnekjøtt.

translation.en: Thank you very much, man, but it was all her idea.
translation.es: Muchas gracias, pero fue idea de ella.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Anne- Lise.
THE REAL JASHAN & THEA ♪ Come on and do the bhangra everybody ♪ ♪ Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey ♪
If you like this, you're going to love the wedding in India.
translation.es: Si esto te gusta, te encantará la boda en la India.

translation.en: I was going to tell you.
